name: Coin Maze
description:
If you like maze games and are looking for one to play, here's a game for you.  In this game you collect coins while going around the maze.  When you get to the middle area, that doesn't have coins, and go forward, you'll go to the next level.

In order to move the square, you need to use the arrow keys.    Also, just so you know, the score resets after each level.   Sorry about that.
